short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Git Diff Flex adds a draggable pane bezel between two files when comparing diffs! Currently only for github.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a pane bezel between a file's diff to expand or contract a side in an effort to make line more readable.
